scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:main && npm run build:module && npm run build:umd
scripts.test: npm run test:types && npm run test:run
scripts.test:all: npm run test:types && npm run test:run && npm run test:integration && npm run test:integration:browser
scripts.test:node:playwright: cd test/integration/node-browser && npm install && cp ../../../dist/umd/supabase.js . && npm run test
scripts.test:bun: cd test/integration/bun && bun install && bun test
scripts.test:verdaccio:bun: cd test/integration/bun && echo 'registry=http://localhost:4873/' > .npmrc && bun install && bun test && rm .npmrc
scripts.test:verdaccio:expo: cd test/integration/expo && echo 'registry=http://localhost:4873/' > .npmrc && npm install && npm test && rm .npmrc
scripts.test:verdaccio:next: cd test/integration/next && echo 'registry=http://localhost:4873/' > .npmrc && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm test && rm .npmrc
scripts.test:verdaccio:deno: cd test/deno && echo 'registry=http://localhost:4873/' > .npmrc && npm install && npm test && rm .npmrc
scripts.test:verdaccio:all: npm run test:verdaccio:bun && npm run test:verdaccio:expo && npm run test:verdaccio:next && npm run test:verdaccio:deno
scripts.serve:coverage: npx nx test:coverage supabase-js && serve test/coverage
